name: CoroCoro!
description:
・Popular in overseas !!
・Perfect for killing time!
・Roll the ball to the blue goal point, it is clear if it is possible to keep.
But to achieve the star x 3 is not easy.
A diamond in the stage "all" won, let's achieve a star x 3!

・And recording the number of stages is "50" or more!

・ 1 consumes the life every time you play the stage.
Life will one recovery in 10 minutes.

・When the stage can not be clear Let's use aggressively item shop.

・The stage where the key is attached is currently releasing stage, you will be able to play by clearing all.

・You can check the players and their ranking in the world in the GameCenter.

・Crown tap the mark you can see your personal best score.

※ I am a Japanese developer.
I think there is a place you unsightly in English places, please understand.
